metadata.title: Roselux Women's Square Neck Short Sleeve Slim Fitted Ribbed Knit Basic Crop Top Tee Shirt
features: Material: Made of skin-friendly, soft and breathable ribbed knit fabric, slight stretch brings you comfortable wear feeling.
Solid tee shirt comes with square neck, short sleeve, crop length for women, crop t shirt,solid color,ribbed knit, cropped length, slim fit, going out crop shirt for women,basic but stylish look.
Women's Teen girls,juniors sexy long sleeve crop top, 90S,2000S ,Y2K vintage style. Perfect for Weekend Casual, Office Wear, Holidays, Party or Daily Life.
Easy to match with pencil jeans, straight leggings, pleated skirts, hot shorts and so on.
Sexy short corp top which stay right above your belly button and makes you look taller.
description: Simple solid color, ribbed knitted striped textured, sexy cutout short cropped length. Fitted Shirt Clings To Body, Showing Your Body Curve Perfectly. Perfect to wear as base layer and match with any fashion items.
